flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I was excited this year to finally use my Pan American World Airways bag that I found at a thrift store 5 years ago. My Halloween costume is inpired by the Pan Am TV series that aired in early September. It was very easy to make from a standard pattern I purchased at a fabric store. Then I added a vintage Life magazine (I collect them), white gloves and a retro makeup look - so super easy.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I was excited this year to finally use my Pan American World Airways bag that I found at a thrift store 5 years ago. My Halloween costume is inpired by the Pan Am TV series that aired in early September. It was very easy to make from a standard pattern I purchased at a fabric store. Then I added a vintage Life magazine (I collect them), white gloves and a retro makeup look - so super easy.

Relevant parts
  • Blue Fabric
  • White Fabric
  • Gold button
  • White piping trim
  • White Gloves
  • Vintage Magazine
  • Fusible interfacing
Tools
  • Iron
  • Sewing machine
  • needle, scissors,

lines.text: Lay out your pattern for the blazer and the skirt - cut out then sew your 2 basic pieces for the costume. For the white collar, I just used the same pattern piece and cut it out with the white fabric then attached it to the finished jacket - so easy!
lines.text_raw: Lay out your pattern for the blazer and the skirt - cut out then sew your 2 basic pieces for the costume. For the white collar, I just used the same pattern piece and cut it out with the white fabric then attached it to the finished jacket - so easy!

lines.text: Pattern for the hat and wing.
lines.text_raw: Pattern for the hat and wing.

lines.text: The hat: Cut out your fabric on the pattern - add the white trim on the outside of the hat. Sew 1/2" seam allowance for the pattern. When finished turn to the right side.
lines.text_raw: The hat: Cut out your fabric on the pattern - add the white trim on the outside of the hat. Sew 1/2" seam allowance for the pattern. When finished turn to the right side.

lines.text: Cut out your wing with the pattern on your blue fabric - add the white trim on the outside wing. Sew then turn right side out; iron.
lines.text_raw: Cut out your wing with the pattern on your blue fabric - add the white trim on the outside wing. Sew then turn right side out; iron.

lines.text: Once finished add a gold button to your wing on the hat.
lines.text_raw: Once finished add a gold button to your wing on the hat.

lines.text: You are almost done! Grab your vintage magazine and Pan Am travel bag, put on some retro-inspired makeup to finish the look and then you're ready to go!!!!
lines.text_raw: You are almost done! Grab your vintage magazine and Pan Am travel bag, put on some retro-inspired makeup to finish the look and then you're ready to go!!!!

guide.summary: Sew a super-easy costume from a pattern or transform a blue suit for a vintage Pan Am look.
guide.time_required: 2 hours to sew the jacket and the skirt
